title: Formicid venom mage

| - | ------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A practitioner of its greatest fear, adept with poison magic. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Formicid venom mages** are humanoid monsters with ant-like features that can be found in the [Spider's Nest](/Spider%27s_Nest "Spider's Nest"). Although feeble, they can deal significant amounts of [poison](/Poison "Poison") and non-elemental damage with their magic.

## Spells

| Spell set |                                                                               |
| :-------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1     | [Venom Bolt](/Venom_Bolt "Venom Bolt") (3d12)                                 |
| Slot2     | [Poison Arrow](/Poison_Arrow "Poison Arrow") (3d14)                           |
| Slot3     | *none*                                                                        |
| Slot4     | [Localized Ignite Poison](/Localized_Ignite_Poison "Localized Ignite Poison") |
| Slot5     | *none*                                                                        |
| Slot6     | *none*                                                                        |

## Tips & Tricks

- Don't let the name fool you into thinking them harmless. Poison resistance will help lessen the impact of their [Poison Magic](/Poison_Magic "Poison Magic") spells, but [Stone Arrow](/Stone_Arrow "Stone Arrow") stings no matter what.

## History

Formicid venom mages were considered for inclusion in [0.14](/0.14 "0.14") but were considered not sufficiently interesting and were removed shortly before the release.

Formicid venom mage

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.
formicid venom mage a 
HP 22-52
HD 7
XP 336
Speed 10
AC 3
EV 8
Will 37
Attack1 10 (hit: plain)


Resistances None
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence High
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Medium
Type formicid, formicid
Flags Actual spells
Burrows
No skeleton
See invisible
Speaks
Spellcaster
Warm-blooded
A practitioner of its greatest fear, adept with poison magic.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Formicid venom mages are humanoid monsters with ant-like features that can be found in the Spider's Nest. Although feeble, they can deal significant amounts of poison and non-elemental damage with their magic.

Spells

Spell set
Slot1 Venom Bolt (3d12)
Slot2 Poison Arrow (3d14)
Slot3 none
Slot4 Localized Ignite Poison
Slot5 none
Slot6 none

Tips & Tricks

  • Don't let the name fool you into thinking them harmless. Poison resistance will help lessen the impact of their Poison Magic spells, but Stone Arrow stings no matter what.

History

Formicid venom mages were considered for inclusion in 0.14 but were considered not sufficiently interesting and were removed shortly before the release.
